title: Christmas On Mill Street
description: It's Christmas 1962. If Calvin Tucker can conquer Mill Street on his Flexible Flyer sled, he'll gain the acceptance he desperately wants and needs asn the new kid on the block. Calvin's quest for approval leads him through a series of Christmas adventures and misadventures. You will experience a jaw-dropping church Christmas program. You will watch Santa dangle from a helicopter and get slammed into the side of a building in front of hundreds of horror-stricken kids. You will watch older brothers terrorize younger siblings on Christmas Eve. And ultimately you will see the thrill of victory despite the agony of defeat with a message of love, acceptance, friendship, family, and Christmas.
author: Joseph Walker
